post.body: you'll be there. we'll be there. it'll be epic!
probably not! not until i pass out anyway. g'night, see you tomorrow!
oh, better not. i'll try to keep the pestering down to a minimum.
'is this van ness and ofarrell yet?' 'no?' 'are we there yet?' 'no?' 'yet?' and so on and so forth
evil things, public transport. i shall sit behind the driver and pester him to tell me when i need to get off. should work!
it's worth it, though :D
oh, i can't wait! the drive is usually an hour. 3! on a bus! trying to make sure i don't get off at the wrong stop! joy!
it's cause the 80 is the bus that stops at every damn stop along the way.
i'll probably nap on the bus. 3 frickin' hours to get there!
i'll probably get up when bailey does and get ready then. i don't have too much to do, just get stuff ready to go.
exactly! but interview is so much better, haha. i do love me some jasper, though.
i'll bring my twilight book, everyone'll talk then, and i can tell them to go read interview with the vampire instead.
oh, i'm sure there'll be tons of lj people there! it's fun meeting people in line! i met one of my best friends in a line.
i'll remember the 3 people i'm pretty sure i'll be meeting. and of course you :0D
it seems lots of people from lj are going, so we should at least meet some, which'll be cool. :0D
down the street from our apartment. i've never actually stood outside for longer than an hour, so, another first :D
last fob show, we got there late and didn't eat till after. patd & mcr i showed up after dinner 'cause the club was
nummy! i am ill prepared on the food front. i don't usually go stand in line so early, haha.
ewww strawberries. i want some golden grahams. or cocoa puffs. haha, 'cause i'm five years old.
yes, i love the doctor. he's so my boyfriend, as my facebook profile says.
that's why i set up the other accounts, after the last time everyone threatened to move away en masse.
i am amused and commenting, but i have to backup & make new accounts. this is not how i'd planned to spend my days off. :0/
i know, but still not the same! i'm hoping it doesn't come to having to move, but if i do, i am pretty set, i guess.
i've got an account there, actually, even though i don't like it much. am making a vox account later, too. i live on lj!
ME NEITHER. nope. not at all. not even a tiny bit. nuh uh.
ianto and capt. jack? i have NEVER squeed out loud at those two. NEVER. *shifty eyes*
god no, i don't HAVE any favorites. i love them all equally, haha. but! HALF NAKED IANTO? YES PLEASE. i mean, no, ew. what?
i am happy when there is anything having to do with ianto. IAAAANNNNTTTTOOO. totally not my favorite, what?
yes, me too! that and torchwood are my big obsessions, after bandom of course, and i couldn't be happier. it's so much fun!
me, too. as it is, i don't even think it's been a year that i've been into who, but i'm glad i discovered it!
mine was 8 years old haha
he's cute, what? i don't even like blondes, omg. i'm so distressed now, he's dad-age in the thing i saw and i was like, ooh, cute
apparently, 5 is the coolest of the doctors, haha. i look forward to seeing him eventually.
i don't know, i haven't seen him yet!
he's amazing and flaky and kind of a dick. but totally hilarious.
we've been netflixing them, and it is amazing and cheesy and awesome. tom baker's scarf ftw!
i haven't yet made it past tom baker, who is my favorite other than tennant.
i don't like a lot of heat either, haha. i just want to be warm again. started who with 9 & 10 - have watched drs 1, 2, 3, & 4
ahaha, i'm usually in bed right now! i don't have to work tomorrow! *dances*
hm. i go to sleep and lj dies. NO MORE SLEEPING, EVER.
